Intro to Shopify

Welcome to Shopify! Whether you're starting a new business or moving an existing business to Shopify, you can find out more here.

After you register for a free trial, follow the initial setup guide to start using Shopify. The guide features step-by-step tutorials for the main tasks that you need to complete before you start selling. In addition to the initial setup guide, you can print the setup checklist to track your progress.

If you are moving your store to Shopify, then get started with your store migration today.

Tip

To see more videos, visit our YouTube channel.
